verses.verse: And <WG2532> he began <WG756> to speak <WG3004> to them <WG846> by <WG1722> parables <WG3850>. A certain man <WG444> planted <WG5452> a vineyard <WG290>, and <WG2532> set <WG4060> a hedge about <WG5418> it <WG2532>, and dug <WG3736> a place for the winepress <WG5276>, and <WG2532> built <WG3618> a tower <WG4444>, and <WG2532> rented <WG1554> it <WG846> out <WG1554> to farmers <WG1092>, and <WG2532> went into a far country <WG589>.

And <WG2532> at the end of the season <WG2540> he sent <WG649> to <WG4314> the farmers <WG1092> a servant <WG1401>, that <WG2443> he might receive <WG2983> from <WG3844> the farmers <WG1092> of <WG575> the fruit <WG2590> of the vineyard <WG290>.
And <WG1161> they caught <WG2983> him <WG2532>, and beat <WG1194> him <WG846>, and sent <WG649> him away <WG649> empty <WG2756>.

And <WG2532> again <WG3825> he sent <WG649> to <WG4314> them <WG846> another <WG243> servant <WG1401>; and at him <WG2548> they cast stones <WG3036>, and wounded <WG2775> him in the head <WG2775>, and <WG2532> sent <WG649> him away <WG649> shamefully handled <WG821>.

And <WG2532> again <WG3825> he sent <WG649> another <WG243>; and him <WG2548> they killed <WG615>, and <WG2532> many <WG4183> others <WG243>; beating <WG1194> some <WG3303>, and <WG1161> killing <WG615> some <WG3588>.

Having <WG2192> yet <WG2089> therefore <WG3767> one <WG1520> son <WG5207>, his <WG846> wellbeloved <WG27>, he sent <WG649> him <WG846> also <WG2532> last <WG2078> to <WG4314> them <WG846>, saying <WG3004>, They will reverence <WG1788> my <WG3450> son <WG3754>.

But <WG1161> those <WG1565> farmers <WG1092> said <WG2036> among <WG4314> themselves <WG3754>, This <WG3778> is <WG2076> the heir <WG2818>; come <WG1205>, let us kill <WG615> him <WG846>, and <WG2532> the inheritance <WG2817> shall be <WG2071> ours <WG2257>.
And <WG2532> they took <WG2983> him <WG846>, and killed <WG615> him <WG2532>, and cast <WG1544> him out of <WG1854> the vineyard <WG290>.

What <WG5101> shall <WG2962> therefore <WG3767> the lord <WG2962> of the vineyard <WG290> do <WG4160>? He will come <WG2064> and <WG2532> destroy <WG622> the farmers <WG1092>, and <WG2532> will give <WG1325> the vineyard <WG290> to others <WG243>.

And have you <WG314> not <WG3761> read <WG314> this <WG3778> scripture <WG1124>; The stone <WG3037> which <WG3739> the builders <WG3618> rejected <WG593> has <WG3778> become <WG1096> <WG99999> the head <WG2776> of the corner <WG1137>:
This <WG3778> was <WG3844> the Lord <WG2962>'s doing <WG1096>, and <WG2532> it is <WG2076> marvelous <WG2298> in <WG1722> our <WG2257> eyes <WG3788>?

And <WG2532> they sought <WG2212> to lay hold <WG2902> on him <WG846>, but <WG2532> feared <WG5399> the people <WG3793>: for <WG1063> they knew <WG1097> that <WG3754> he had spoken <WG2036> the parable <WG3850> against <WG4314> them <WG846>: and they left <WG863> him <WG846>, and <WG2532> went their way <WG565>.

And <WG2532> they sent <WG649> to <WG4314> him <WG846> certain <WG5100> of the Pharisees <WG5330> and <WG2532> of the Herodians <WG2265>, to <WG2443> catch <WG64> him <WG846> in <WG3056> his words <WG3056>.

And when <WG1161> they had come <WG2064>, they said <WG3004> to him <WG846>, Master <WG1320>, we know <WG1492> that <WG3754> you are <WG1488> true <WG227>, and <WG2532> <WG99999> care <WG3199> <WG99999> for <WG4012> no man <WG3762>: for <WG1063> you regard <WG991> not <WG3756> <WG99999> the person <WG4383> of men <WG444>, but <WG235> teach <WG1321> the way <WG3598> of God <WG2316> in <WG1909> truth <WG225>: Is it lawful <WG1832> to give <WG1325> tribute <WG2778> to Cæsar <WG2541>, or <WG2228> not <WG3756>?

Shall we give <WG1325>, or <WG2228> shall we <WG1325> not <WG3361> give <WG1325>? But <WG1161> he <WG3588>, knowing <WG1492> their <WG846> hypocrisy <WG5272>, said <WG2036> to them <WG846>, Why <WG5101> tempt <WG3985> me <WG3165>? Bring <WG5342> me <WG3427> a denarius <WG1220>, that <WG2443> I may see it <WG1492>.

And <WG1161> they brought <WG5342> it <WG2532>. And he said <WG3004> to them <WG846>, Whose <WG5101> is this <WG3778> image <WG1504> and <WG2532> superscription <WG1923>? And <WG1161> they said <WG2036> to him <WG846>, Cæsar <WG2541>'s.

And <WG2532> Jesus <WG2424> answering <WG611> said <WG2036> to them <WG846>, Render <WG591> to Cæsar <WG2541> the things that are <WG3588> Cæsar <WG2541>'s, and <WG2532> to God <WG2316> the things that are <WG3588> God <WG2316>'s. And <WG2532> they marveled <WG2296> at <WG1909> him <WG846>.

Then <WG2532> came <WG2064> to <WG4314> him <WG846> the Sadducees <WG4523>, which <WG3748> say <WG3004> there is <WG1511> no <WG3361> resurrection <WG386>; and <WG2532> they asked <WG1905> him <WG846>, saying <WG3004>,

Master <WG1320>, Moses <WG3475> wrote <WG1125> to us <WG3754>, If <WG1437> a man <WG5100>'s brother <WG80> die <WG599>, and <WG2532> leave <WG2641> his wife <WG1135> behind him <WG2532>, and leave <WG863> no <WG3361> sons <WG5043>, that <WG2443> his <WG846> brother <WG80> should take <WG2983> his <WG846> wife <WG1135>, and <WG2532> raise up <WG1817> seed <WG4690> to his <WG846> brother <WG80>.
Now there were <WG2258> seven <WG2033> brothers <WG80>: and <WG2532> the first <WG4413> took <WG2983> a wife <WG1135>, and <WG2532> dying <WG599> left <WG863> no <WG3756> seed <WG4690>.
And <WG2532> the second <WG1208> took <WG2983> her <WG846>, and <WG2532> died <WG2532>, neither <WG3761> left <WG863> he <WG846> any seed <WG4690>: and <WG2532> the third <WG5154> likewise <WG5615>.
And <WG2532> the seven <WG2033> had <WG2983> her <WG846>, and <WG2532> left <WG863> no <WG3756> seed <WG4690>: last <WG2078> of all <WG3956> the woman <WG1135> died <WG599> also <WG2532>.

In <WG1722> the resurrection <WG386> therefore <WG3767>, when <WG3752> they shall rise <WG450>, whose <WG5101> wife <WG1135> shall she be <WG2071> of them <WG846>? For <WG1063> the seven <WG2033> had <WG2192> her <WG846> to wife <WG1135>.

And <WG2532> Jesus <WG2424> answering <WG611> said <WG2036> to them <WG846>, Do you <WG4105> not <WG3756> therefore <WG5124> err <WG4105>, because <WG1223> you know <WG1492> not <WG3361> the scriptures <WG1124>, neither <WG3366> the power <WG1411> of God <WG2316>?

For <WG1063> when <WG3752> they shall rise <WG450> from <WG1537> the dead <WG3498>, they <WG1060> neither <WG3777> marry <WG1060>, nor <WG3777> are given in marriage <WG1061>; but <WG235> are <WG1526> as <WG5613> the angels <WG32> which are <WG3588> in <WG1722> heaven <WG3772>.

And <WG1161> as touching <WG4012> the dead <WG3498>, that <WG3754> they rise <WG1453>: have you <WG314> not <WG3756> read <WG314> in <WG1722> the book <WG976> of Moses <WG3475>, how <WG5613> in <WG1909> the bush <WG942> God <WG2316> spoke <WG2036> to him <WG846>, saying <WG3004>, I <WG1473> am the God <WG2316> of Abraham <WG11>, and <WG2532> the God <WG2316> of Isaac <WG2464>, and <WG2532> the God <WG2316> of Jacob <WG2384>?
He is <WG2076> not <WG3756> the God <WG2316> of the dead <WG3498>, but <WG235> the God <WG2316> of the living <WG2198>: you <WG5210> therefore <WG3767> do <WG4105> greatly <WG4183> err <WG4105>.

And <WG2532> one <WG1520> of the scribes <WG1122> came <WG4334>, and having heard <WG191> them <WG846> reasoning together <WG4802>, and perceiving <WG1492> that <WG3754> he had answered <WG611> them <WG846> well <WG2573>, asked <WG1905> him <WG846>, Which <WG4169> is <WG2076> the first <WG4413> commandment <WG1785> of all <WG3956>?

And <WG1161> Jesus <WG2424> answered <WG611> him <WG3754>, The first <WG4413> of all <WG3956> the commandments <WG1785> is <WG191>, Hear, O Israel <WG2474>; The Lord <WG2962> our <WG2257> God <WG2316> is <WG2076> one <WG1520> Lord <WG2962>:

And <WG2532> you shall love <WG25> the Lord <WG2962> your <WG4675> God <WG2316> with <WG1537> all <WG3650> your <WG4675> heart <WG2588>, and <WG2532> with <WG1537> all <WG3650> your <WG4675> soul <WG5590>, and <WG2532> with <WG1537> all <WG3650> your <WG4675> mind <WG1271>, and <WG2532> with <WG1537> all <WG3650> your <WG4675> strength <WG2479>: this <WG3778> is the first <WG4413> commandment <WG1785>.

And <WG2532> the second <WG1208> is like <WG3664> it <WG846>, namely this, You shall love <WG25> your <WG4675> neighbor <WG4139> as <WG5613> yourself <WG4572>. There is <WG2076> none <WG3756> other <WG243> commandment <WG1785> greater <WG3187> than these <WG3778>.

And <WG2532> the scribe <WG1122> said <WG2036> to him <WG846>, Well <WG2573>, Master <WG1320>, you have said <WG2036> <WG99999> the truth <WG225>: for <WG3754> there is <WG2076> one <WG1520> God <WG2316>; and <WG2532> there is <WG2076> none <WG3756> other <WG243> but <WG4133> he <WG846>:

And <WG2532> to love <WG25> him <WG846> with <WG1537> all <WG3650> the heart <WG2588>, and <WG2532> with <WG1537> all <WG3650> the understanding <WG4907>, and <WG2532> with <WG1537> all <WG3650> the soul <WG5590>, and <WG2532> with <WG1537> all <WG3650> the strength <WG2479>, and <WG2532> to love <WG25> his neighbor <WG4139> as <WG5613> himself <WG1438>, is <WG2076> more <WG4119> than all <WG3956> whole burnt offerings <WG3646> and <WG2532> sacrifices <WG2378>.

And <WG2532> when Jesus <WG2424> saw <WG1492> that <WG3754> he answered <WG611> prudently <WG3562>, he said <WG2036> to him <WG846>, You are <WG1488> not <WG3756> far <WG3112> from <WG575> the kingdom <WG932> of God <WG2316>. And <WG2532> no man <WG3762> after that <WG3765> dared <WG5111> ask <WG1905> him <WG846> any question <WG846>.

And <WG2532> Jesus <WG2424> answered <WG611> and said <WG3004>, while he taught <WG1321> in <WG1722> the temple <WG2411>, How <WG4459> say <WG3004> the scribes <WG1122> that <WG3754> Christ <WG5547> is <WG2076> the Son <WG5207> of David <WG1138>?

For <WG1063> David <WG1138> himself <WG846> said <WG2036> by <WG1722> the Holy <WG40> Spirit <WG4151>, The Lord <WG2962> said <WG2036> to my <WG3450> Lord <WG2962>, Sit you <WG2521> on <WG1537> my <WG3450> right hand <WG1188>, until <WG2193> <WG99999> I make <WG5087> your <WG4675> enemies <WG2190> your <WG4675> footstool <WG4228>.

David <WG1138> therefore <WG3767> himself <WG846> calls <WG3004> him <WG846> Lord <WG2962>; and <WG2532> from where <WG4159> is he <WG2076> then his <WG846> son <WG5207>? And <WG2532> the common <WG4183> people <WG3793> heard <WG191> him <WG846> gladly <WG2234>.

And <WG2532> he said <WG3004> to them <WG846> in <WG1722> his <WG846> teaching <WG1322>, Beware <WG991> of <WG575> the scribes <WG1122>, which <WG3588> love <WG2309> to go <WG4043> in <WG1722> long robes <WG4749>, and <WG2532> love salutations <WG783> in <WG1722> the marketplaces <WG58>,
And <WG2532> the chief seats <WG4410> in <WG1722> the synagogues <WG4864>, and <WG2532> the uppermost rooms <WG4411> at <WG1722> feasts <WG1173>:

Which <WG3588> devour <WG2719> widows <WG5503>' houses <WG3614>, and <WG2532> for a pretense <WG4392> make <WG4336> long <WG3117> prayers <WG4336>: these <WG3778> shall receive <WG2983> greater <WG4053> damnation <WG2917>.

And <WG2532> Jesus <WG2424> sat <WG2523> over against <WG2713> the treasury <WG1049>, and looked <WG2334> how <WG4459> the people <WG3793> cast <WG906> money <WG5475> into <WG1519> the treasury <WG1049>: and <WG2532> many <WG4183> that were rich <WG4145> cast <WG906> in much <WG4183>.
And <WG2532> there came <WG2064> a certain <WG1520> poor <WG4434> widow <WG5503>, and she threw in <WG906> two <WG1417> mites <WG3016>, which <WG3739> make <WG2076> a farthing <WG2835>.

And <WG2532> he called <WG4341> to him his <WG846> disciples <WG3101>, and said <WG3004> to them <WG846>, Truly <WG281> I say <WG3004> to you <WG5213>, That <WG3754> this <WG3778> poor <WG4434> widow <WG5503> has cast <WG906> more <WG4119> in <WG906>, than all <WG3956> they which <WG3588> have cast <WG906> into <WG1519> the treasury <WG1049>:

For <WG1063> all <WG3956> they did cast in <WG906> of <WG1537> their <WG846> abundance <WG4052>; but <WG1161> she <WG846> of <WG1537> her <WG846> want <WG5304> did cast in <WG906> all <WG3956> that <WG3745> she had <WG2192>, even all <WG3650> her <WG846> living <WG3778>.
